attributes.action: Once completed, Renumber the A1(M) North of Aberford as the M1.
attributes.background: Once the Leeming to Barton stretch of the A1(M) is completed, the route from Aberford to Birtley, near Gateshead, should be renamed as the M1. This would boost economic growth in the North East and North Yorkshire and would be easier for foreign drivers as their is no longer a sudden number change.
